thought: To implement the workflow, first define all necessary functions for the actions and trigger: manual trigger, reading Google Sheets, two aiCompletion actions, Slack message sending, and Gmail sending.
plan: Define trigger function for manual trigger.
Define action function for reading Google Sheets data.
Define action function for the first aiCompletion for classification.
Define action function for Slack message posting.
Define action function for the second aiCompletion for reminder email content generation.
Define action function for sending email via Gmail.
criticism: Without defining these functions first, the workflow cannot be implemented or tested.

functions.comments: Trigger the workflow manually by user.
Read all rows from a specific Google Sheet document and sheet name.
TODO: Implement reading with documentId and sheetName.

functions.comments: Perform AI completion for classifying commercial entry descriptions.
Perform AI completion for generating reminder emails for 'to Customer' entries.
